text: "Cool Jerk" is a 1966 song by R & B band The Capitols. It went to number 7 in the United States and number 9 in Canada. It was used in the 1992 movie Home Alone 2: Lost in New York. It has been covered by new wave band The Go-Go's. ==References== Category:1966 songs Category:The Coasters songs Category:The Go-Go's songs
title: Cool Jerk
